summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的更新位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the update location for the application.

value.span: 字串，表示應用程式的更新位置。

span.span: A string that indicates the update location for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定此屬性，為應用程式會不定義任何更新位置。If this property is not specified, no update location will be defined for the application. 不過，如果未指定應用程式更新，就必須指定更新位置。However, if application updates are specified, the update location must be specified. 指定的值應該是完整的 URL 或通用命名慣例 (UNC) 路徑。The specified value should be a fully qualified URL or Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path.

member this.DisallowUrlActivation : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否應封鎖應用程式使其無法透過 URL 啟動。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application should be blocked from being started by means of a URL.

value.span: 如果封鎖應用程式使其無法透過 URL 啟動，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application is blocked from being started by means of a URL otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個選項`true`，只能從使用者的啟動應用程式**啟動**功能表。If this option is `true`, the application can only be started from the user's **Start** menu. 預設為 `false`。The default is `false`. 如果此選項則會忽略是`false`。This option is ignored if is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Install { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Install : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式為已安裝的應用程式或是僅限線上的應用程式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is an installed application or an online-only application.

value.span: 如果應用程式為已安裝的應用程式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application is an installed application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，應用程式會安裝在使用者的**開始**功能表，然後它可以使用來移除**新增或移除程式**控制項台中。If this property is set to `true`, the application will be installed on the user's **Start** menu, and it can be removed by using **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel. 預設為 `true`。The default is `true`. 如果這個屬性設定為`false`，應用程式是針對從網頁線上使用，因此只提供線上。If this property is set to `false`, the application is intended for online use from a Web page and is available online only. > [!NOTE] > WPF 網頁瀏覽器應用程式，您必須設定屬性，以`true`，而且您也必須將至`false`。For WPF Web Browser Applications, you must set the property to `true`, and you must also set to `false`. 如果不符合此條件，您會收到[MSBuild 錯誤 MSB3116](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e)。If this condition is not met, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool MapFileExtensions { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.MapFileExtensions : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否使用 .deploy 副檔名對應。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether .deploy file extension mapping is used.

value.span: 如果使用 .deploy 副檔名對應，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if .deploy file extension mapping is used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，每個程式檔以.deploy 副檔名發行。If this property is set to `true`, every program file is published with a .deploy file extension. 此設定可用於限制必須啟用 ClickOnce 應用程式部署時，解除封鎖的副檔名數目的網頁伺服器安全性。This setting is useful for Web server security to limit the number of file extensions that have to be unblocked to enable ClickOnce application deployment. 預設為 `false`。The default is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MinimumRequiredVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MinimumRequiredVersion : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的最小必要版本號碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum required version number for an application.

value.span: 字串，表示應用程式的最小必要版本號碼。

span.span: A string indicating the minimum required version number for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用者的電腦有版本低於最小的必要版本，這個屬性所指定的應用程式，使用者不會略過更新的選項。If the user's computer has a version of the application that is lower than the minimum required version specified by this property, the user will not have the option to skip the update. 預設值是最小必要的版本。The default is to have no minimum required version. 此輸入時，才適用設為`true`。This input applies only when is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Product { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Product : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application.

value.span: 字串，表示應用程式的名稱。

span.span: A string that indicates the name of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性會不指定任何值，會從產生的資訊清單的識別來推斷名稱。If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the identity of the generated manifest. 這個名稱用於的捷徑名稱上**開始**功能表，而且會出現在名稱的一部分**新增或移除程式**控制項台中。This name is used for the shortcut name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Publisher { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Publisher : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的發行者 (Publisher)。

span.span: Gets or sets the publisher of the application.

value.span: 字串，表示應用程式的發行者。

span.span: A string that indicates the publisher of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性會不指定任何值，則會推斷名稱，從已註冊的使用者，或從產生的資訊清單的識別。If no value is specified for this property, the name is inferred from the registered user or from the identity of the generated manifest. 這個名稱用做為資料夾名稱上**開始**功能表，而且會出現在名稱的一部分**新增或移除程式**控制項台中。This name is used for the folder name on the **Start** menu and is part of the name that appears in **Add or Remove Programs** in Control Panel.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否讓應用程式使用 URL 查詢字串參數。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether URL query-string parameters are available to the application.

value.span: 如果應用程式可以使用 URL 查詢字串參數，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if URL query-string parameters are available to the application; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，URL 查詢字串參數可用於應用程式。If this property is set to `true`, URL query-string parameters are available to the application. 預設值是`false`，指定參數將無法使用應用程式。The default is `false`, specifying that parameters will not be available to the application.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UpdateEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UpdateEnabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出應用程式是否可更新。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application is updatable.

value.span: 如果應用程式可更新，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application is updatable; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，是可更新的應用程式。If this property is set to `true`, the application is updatable. 預設為 `false`。The default is `false`. 此輸入時，才適用設為`true`。This input applies only when is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int UpdateInterval { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.UpdateInterval : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定應用程式的更新間隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the update interval for the application.

value.span: 整數，表示應用程式的更新間隔。

span.span: An integer that indicates the update interval for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是零。The default is zero. 此輸入才適用時才並都設為`true`。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode UpdateMode { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定物件，指出應用程式啟動前是否在前景檢查更新，或是當應用程式執行時在背景檢查更新。

span.span: Gets or sets an object indicating whether updates should be checked in the foreground before the application is started, or in the background while the application is running.

value.span: 物件，指出應用程式在啟動前是否檢查更新，或是在應用程式執行時檢查更新。

span.span: An object that indicates whether updates should be checked before the application is started, or while the application is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性設定為`Foreground`，會在前景檢查更新。If this property is set to `Foreground`, updates are checked in the foreground. 預設為 `Background`。The default is `Background`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 此輸入才適用時才並都設為`true`。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit UpdateUnit { Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit get(); void set(Microsoft::Build::Tasks::Deployment::ManifestUtilities::UpdateUnit value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於 屬性的單位。

span.span: Gets or sets the units used for the property.

value.span: 物件，表示用於 屬性的單位。

span.span: An object that indicates the units used for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用於更新的間隔時間單位的值如下： `Days`， `Hours`，和`Weeks`。The following values are available for the units used for the update interval: `Days`, `Hours`, and `Weeks`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 此輸入才適用時才並都設為`true`。This input only applies only when and are both set to `true`.
